content: Can you write a Ruby code to search through Tom Cruise's movies and find five movies where he plays a character with a fear of heights? Bonus points if one of the movies is where he scaled the Burj Khalifa in Dubai.

To address your request, we need to focus on Tom Cruise's filmography and identify movies where his character has a fear of heights. While I can provide a Ruby script to search through a list of movies, it's important to note that character traits, like a fear of heights, aren't typically stored in simple datasets. So, the solution involves some manual input of relevant data.

Here's a hypothetical Ruby script that could be used to filter such movies from a manually created list:

```ruby
# A hypothetical list of Tom Cruise movies with a character trait
movies = [
  { title: 'Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol', fear_of_heights: true },
  { title: 'Top Gun', fear_of_heights: false },
  { title: 'Top Gun: Maverick', fear_of_heights: false },
  { title: 'Mission: Impossible – Fallout', fear_of_heights: true },
  { title: 'The Firm', fear_of_heights: false },
  { title: 'Mission: Impossible III', fear_of_heights: true },
  { title: 'Edge of Tomorrow', fear_of_heights: false },
  # Add more movies with appropriate character traits
]

# Filter movies where Tom Cruise's character has a fear of heights
movies_with_fear_of_heights = movies.select { |movie| movie[:fear_of_heights] }

# Get the top five movies or all if less than five
top_five_movies = movies_with_fear_of_heights.first(5)

# Output the titles of the filtered movies
puts "Movies where Tom Cruise's character has a fear of heights:"
top_five_movies.each { |movie| puts movie[:title] }
```

In this script, I've manually indicated which of Tom Cruise's movies might feature a character with a fear of heights. The list includes "Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol," where he famously scaled the Burj Khalifa in Dubai, which is an iconic scene involving heights, even if his character may not have a fear of them.

Feel free to adjust the list and character traits based on more detailed research or insights into his roles!
